metadata.title: CVE-2024-52318 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: Incorrect object recycling and reuse vulnerability in Apache Tomcat.This issue affects Apache Tomcat: 11.0.0, 10.1.31, 9.0.96.Users are recommended to upgrade to version 11.0.1, 10.1.32 or 9.0.97,which fixes the issue.

criterions.comment: tomcat6 package in xenial is affected and may need fixing.
tomcat7 package in xenial is affected and may need fixing.
tomcat8 package in xenial is affected and may need fixing.
